summary: When a crooked businessman is fatally shot, a hotshot New York newspaper reporter specializing in murder stories narrows in on the dead man's associate.
cast: Spencer Tracy|Virginia Bruce|Lionel Atwill|Harvey Stephens|Robert Barrat|James Stewart|William Collier Sr.|Bobby Watson|William Demarest|John Sheehan|Lucien Littlefield|George Chandler|Fuzzy Knight|Louise Henry|Robert Warwick|Joe Irving|Francis X. Bushman Jr.|Stanley Andrews|Irving Bacon|William Bailey|Margaret Bert|Al Bridge|James P. Burtis|Allan Cavan|Jack Cheatham|Lita Chevret|Davison Clark|Charles Coleman|Heinie Conklin|Ed Coppo|Jack Daley|Charles Delaney|Harry Depp|John Dilson|James Donlan|James Flavin|Robert Frazer|George Guhl|Howard Hickman|Selmer Jackson|Edward Keane|Wilbur Mack|Margaret Mann|Larry McGrath|Tom McGuire|Frank McLure|Bert Moorhouse|Bob Murphy|Frank O'Connor|Milton Owen|Reginald Pash|James Pierce|Cyril Ring|Jeanie Roberts|Matty Roubert|Larry Steers|Ben Taggart|Charles Trowbridge|Harry Tyler|Theodore von Eltz
title: La voz que acusa
